handbook.title: About our Company
handbook.lead: NJ Corporation is an innovative trading and service company established with investment from a publicly listed Chinese company, dedicated to providing “one-stop, on-site supply chain solutions” for Japanese SMEs and apparel brands.
itemBodies: NJ Corporation was founded with investment from a publicly listed Chinese company. Backed by solid capital strength and extensive supply-chain resources in China, it serves as an innovative trading service platform for the Japanese market.
We focus on providing “one-stop, on-site supply chain solutions” for Japanese SMEs and apparel brands, accompanying clients from planning and sampling all the way through production and delivery.
Positioned as a “next-generation trading company,” we are committed to becoming the most trusted Chinese supply-chain partner for Japanese businesses.
